text: The women's 3x3 basketball tournament at the 2019 Pan American Games in Lima, Peru was held between 27 and 29 July 2019. == Qualification == Teams were entered based on their FIBA Ranking. Host nation Peru was barred from participating following sanctions imposed on the Peruvian Basketball Federation. {| class="wikitable" width=500 |- ! Event ! Date ! Vacancies ! title: Basketball at the 2019 Pan American Games – Women's 3x3 tournament
